We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AdvanceDeclineRatio _adr;
// In Initialize()
_adr = ADR(symbols);

// In OnData()
if (_adr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADR Current", _adr.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.adr = self.ADR(symbols)

# In OnData()
if self.adr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADR Current", self.adr.Current);
